name: BootstrapLabs
overview:
BootstrapLabs is a Silicon Valley based Seed+ Venture Capital Fund and a Execution Platform for foreign born startups to connect and relocate to Silicon Valley. We employ a very hands on and entrepreneurial approach to support and advise startup entrepreneurs to help them execute to the best of their ability, and tap into the benefits of Silicon Valley.

Since 2009, BootstrapLabs has helped foreign born startups such as Prezi, Witsbits, AudioDraft and Zerply to connect and relocate to the Silicon Valley eco-system, while maintaining their roots.

Today these startups are valued at $150M+, employ more than 150 people and have been funded (at a total of more than $25M).

milestones.description: BoostrapLabs client Prezi, Inc closed a series A-round from Danish VC SunStone Capital. At the same time Twitter founder Jack Dorsey is coming onboard as an advisor to Prezi.
